page.title: 05LOCAL NEWS
page.content: Parish Walk May 6 Procession led by Silkstone Band to Silkstone Recreation Ground where there were games,races and fun for all the family.Free crisps and ice cream for children. Silkstone branch of the Royal British Legion commemorated V.E.Day with a wreath laying ceremony at Cenotaph in Silkstone.Sunday School queen crowned,games,raffles.Â£400 raised for the church. Silkstone Guide and Brownies attended a rally at Hesley Wood Chapeltown to celabrate 75 years of Guides. 23 June Silkstone J+I School Activity Evening.July 18.Ice Skating,Mini Motorbikes,B.M.X Display,Bouncy Castle,Football,Rounders,Welly Throwing,Barney bus,Brownies Camp Fire Sing,Stalls and Barbecue.
